org.jmotif.distance

Class EuclideanDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmotif.distance.EuclideanDistance

  • public final class EuclideanDistance
extends java.lang.Object
    The Euclidean distance implementation for a variety of datatypes.
    Author:
    Pavel Senin
